name: Returned Palamnite
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.Fleeting Anger: If another creature deals damage to the Returned, the Returned makes attack rolls with advantage until the end of its next turn.
traits.Turn Resistance: The Returned has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.
traits.Unreadable Face: The Returned is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Wisdom (Insight) checks to ascertain the Returned's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.
